summary: A comprehensive test suite for the CuPy library that validates its GPU-accelerated functionality across core components such as initialization, array backend selection, dimensionality detection, type handling, and integrations with cuDNN, cuSolver, cuSparse, and cuTensor. The tests cover forward/backward convolutions, activation functions, linear solvers, eigenvalue problems, sparse matrix operations, tensor contractions, and error handling scenarios.
